title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of patients completed assessments, reducing discontinuation risk by 30%, enhancing clinical trial data quality.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Implement automated ePRO reminders at key intervals to improve patient engagement and compliance.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: Upcoming FDA regulations may require PRO integration in trials, emphasizing the need for robust ePRO solutions now.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias could skew results toward healthier patients, potentially affecting the clinical validity of PROs.
